issues.details: Tab sequence (4 elements) is much shorter than expected (212 potentially focusable elements)
issues.recommendation: Check for elements that should be focusable but aren't

issues.details: Element with aria-hidden='true' contains 3 focusable children
issues.recommendation: Remove focusable elements from aria-hidden containers or ensure they also have tabindex='-1'

issues.text:
Featured News
SSE to build power station in Ireland running on sustainable biofuels
SSE Thermal has made the final investment decision to build Tarbert's Next-Generation Power Station. The station will run on 100% sustainable biofuels and have the potential to convert to hydrogen.
